sub_fields.label: Slider Text Line One
sub_fields.name: slider_text
sub_fields.instructions: There is a 30 character limit on this text

sub_fields.label: Slider Text Line Two
sub_fields.name: slider_text_line_two
sub_fields.instructions: There is a 30 character limit on this text

sub_fields.label: Slider Image
sub_fields.name: slider_image
sub_fields.instructions: These images must be a minimum of 1920 x 1280 px

sub_fields.label: What's On Format
sub_fields.name: whats_on_format
sub_fields.instructions: This will use the ordering from the What's On Page

sub_fields.label: Featured blog post
sub_fields.name: featured_blog_post
sub_fields.instructions: This will default to most recent post if left blank

sub_fields.label: Link Title
sub_fields.name: link_title
sub_fields.instructions: This will default to the title of the linked page if left blank

sub_fields.label: Link Title
sub_fields.name: link_title
sub_fields.instructions: This will default to the title of the linked page if left blank

sub_fields.label: Embeddable Media
sub_fields.name: embeddable_media
sub_fields.instructions: Paste the link from an embeddable media (YouTube, Vimeo, Soundcloud, etc)

sub_fields.label: Carousel
sub_fields.name: carousel
sub_fields.instructions: Adding a carousel here will override the main embedded media. So leave this blank to show the main media

sub_fields.label: Embedded Media
sub_fields.name: embedded_media
sub_fields.instructions: Add the url from Youtube or Vimeo

sub_fields.label: Google Map Embed
sub_fields.name: google_map_embed_url
sub_fields.instructions: From Google Maps, click share, and then Embed a Map. Paste the code here
